title: Matchsafe, ""A [Match] For You At Any Time"", 1886–87
markings: S.M, lion passant, London town mark, date letter "L", duty mark, all stamped on bezel. S.M , lion passant, date letter "L", stamped on underside of lid.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, rounded corners and sides, featuring polychrome enamel, word/picture rebus, inscribed "A [Match] For You At Any Time", with image of wooden match stick with red tip substituted for word "Match". Lid hinged on upper left. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, ""A [Match] For You At Any Time"", 1886–87.
1886–87. Silver, enamel. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-54.
